description: Deploy the Syncular server on Cloudflare Workers + Durable Objects and choose a database + blob storage backend
---

# Cloudflare

Syncular can run on the edge with Cloudflare Workers + Durable Objects via `@syncular/server-cloudflare`.

This is a good fit when you want:
- Low-latency sync endpoints near users
- Cloudflare-native networking and auth
- Blob storage on R2

## How the pieces fit

Cloudflare deployment is **adapter + dialect**:

- **Adapter:** `@syncular/server-cloudflare` (Workers + Durable Objects + R2 helpers)
- **Database dialect:** choose one based on your DB:
  - D1/SQLite: `@syncular/dialect-d1` + `@syncular/server-dialect-sqlite`
  - Neon/Postgres: `@syncular/dialect-neon` + `@syncular/server-dialect-postgres`
